authority.description: Authority is the address of the governance account.

params.description: NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

MsgUpdateParams.title: Msg Update Params
MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the request type for updating module's params. Since: v14

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.title: Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description: Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.

intento.alloc.v1.DistributionProportions.title: Distribution Proportions
intento.alloc.v1.DistributionProportions.description: DistributionProportions defines the proportion that each bucket  receives.

distributionProportions.description: distribution_proportions defines the proportion of the minted denom

supplementAmount.description: SupplementAmount is the amount to be supplemented from the pool on top of newly minted coins.

intento.alloc.v1.Params.title: Params
intento.alloc.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the alloc module.

intento.alloc.v1.WeightedAddress.title: Weighted Address
intento.alloc.v1.WeightedAddress.description: WeightedAddress defines an address with a weight.
